anya-e0102n4:2_1: Dhātūnaṁ anantaraṁ uddiṭṭhāni pana indriyānīti bāvīsatindriyāni –
anya-e0102n4:2_2: cakkhundriyaṁ sotindriyaṁ ghānindriyaṁ jivhindriyaṁ kāyindriyaṁ manindriyaṁ itthindriyaṁ purisindriyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:2_3: jīvitindriyaṁ sukhindriyaṁ dukkhindriyaṁ somanassindriyaṁ domanassindriyaṁ upekkhindriyaṁ saddhindriyaṁ
anya-e0102n4:2_4: vīriyindriyaṁ satindriyaṁ samādhindriyaṁ paññindriyaṁ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyanti.  Tattha –
anya-e0102n4:4_0: Bhedābhedā tathā kiccā, bhūmito ca vinicchayaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:5_0: Tattha cakkhādīnaṁ tāva cakkhatīti cakkhūtiādinā nayena attho pakāsito.
anya-e0102n4:5_1: Pacchimesu pana tīsu paṭhamaṁ pubbabhāge anaññātaṁ amataṁ padaṁ catusaccadhammaṁ vā jānissāmīti evaṁ
anya-e0102n4:5_2: paṭipannassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:5_4: Tatiyaṁ aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitaññāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa uppajjanato indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca aññātāvindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:6_10: Tenevettha kammasañjanitāni tāva indriyāni kusalākusalakammaṁ ulliṅgenti.
anya-e0102n4:6_11: Tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
anya-e0102n4:6_12: Sabbāneva panetāni bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena ca indriyāni.
anya-e0102n4:6_13: Teneva bhagavatā munindena kānici gocarāsevanāya kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenāpi indriyāni.
anya-e0102n4:7_2: tasmiṁ tikkhe tikkhattā mande ca mandattāti.
anya-e0102n4:8_0: Lakkhaṇādīhīti lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānehipi cakkhādīnaṁ vinicchayaṁ vijāniyāti attho.
anya-e0102n4:8_1: Tāni ca nesaṁ lakkhaṇādīni khandhaniddese vuttāneva.
anya-e0102n4:9_1: Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṁ desitāni.
anya-e0102n4:9_2: So pana attabhāvo yaṁ dhammaṁ upādāya itthīti vā purisoti vā saṅkhaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0102n4:9_3: ayaṁ soti nidassanatthaṁ tato itthindriyaṁ purisindriyañca.
anya-e0102n4:9_4: So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṁ tato jīvitindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:9_8: sabbaṁ taṁ dukkhanti ñāpanatthaṁ tato sukhindriyādīni.
anya-e0102n4:9_9: Taṁnirodhatthaṁ pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṁ tato saddhādīni.
anya-e0102n4:9_10: Imāya paṭipattiyā esa dhammo paṭhamaṁ attani pātubhavatīti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṁ tato anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:9_11: Tasseva phalattā tato anantaraṁ bhāvetabbato ca tato aññindriyaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:9_13: adhigate ca pana imasmiṁ natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṁ ante paramassāsabhūtaṁ aññātāvindriyaṁ desitanti ayamettha kamo.
anya-e0102n4:10_2: Sesānaṁ abhedoti evamettha bhedābhedato vinicchayaṁ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n4:11_1: Cakkhundriyassa tāva “cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā taṁsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṁ indriyapaccayena
anya-e0102n4:11_2: paccayo”ti vacanato yaṁ taṁ indriyapaccayabhāvena sādhetabbaṁ attano tikkhamandādibhāvena cakkhuviññāṇādidhammānaṁ
anya-e0102n4:11_14: Aññātāvindriyassa sabbakiccesu ussukkappahānañceva amatābhimukhabhāvapaccayatā ca sampayuttānanti evamettha kiccato vinicchayaṁ vijāniyā.
anya-e0102n4:12_3: Avasāne tīṇi lokuttarānevāti evamettha bhūmitopi vinicchayaṁ vijāneyya.
anya-e0102n4:24_0: Tattha vibhāgatoti dukkhādīnaṁ hi cattāro cattāro atthā vibhattā tathā avitathā anaññathā,
anya-e0102n4:24_3: ime cattāro dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā.
anya-e0102n4:24_7: Ime cattāro maggassa maggaṭṭhā tathā avitathā anaññathā”ti.
anya-e0102n4:24_8: Tathā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”ti evamādi.
anya-e0102n4:24_9: Iti evaṁ vibhattānaṁ catunnaṁ catunnaṁ atthānaṁ vasena dukkhādīni veditabbānīti.
anya-e0102n4:25_1: Nibbacanalakkhaṇādippabhedatoti ettha pana nibbacanato tāva idha du-
anya-e0102n4:25_3: Kucchitaṁ hi puttaṁ dupputtoti vadanti. Khaṁ-
anya-e0102n4:25_8: Tasmā kucchitattā tucchattā ca dukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:26_1: iti ca ayaṁ saddo “samāgamo sameta”ntiādīsu saṁyogaṁ dīpeti. U-
anya-e0102n4:26_5: Iti dukkhassa saṁyoge uppattikāraṇattā dukkhasamudayanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:27_3: Tasmā abhāvo ettha saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa sabbagatisuññattā,
anya-e0102n4:27_4: samadhigate vā tasmiṁ saṁsāracārakasaṅkhātassa dukkharodhassa abhāvo hoti,
anya-e0102n4:28_0: Catutthasaccaṁ pana yasmā etaṁ dukkhanirodhaṁ gacchati ārammaṇavasena tadabhimukhabhūtattā,
anya-e0102n4:29_17: Atha vā etesaṁ abhisambuddhattā ariyabhāvasiddhitopi ariyasaccāni. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:29_20: catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisambuddhattā tathāgato arahaṁ sammāsambuddho ariyoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:29_21: Apica kho pana ariyāni saccānītipi ariyasaccāni.
anya-e0102n4:29_22: Ariyānīti tathāni avitathāni avisaṁvādakānīti attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:29_26: tasmā ariyasaccānīti vuccantī”ti evamettha nibbacanato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:30_15: Tathā saṅkhatataṇhā asaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti evamettha lakkhaṇādippabhedato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:31_0: 533.Atthatthuddhāratocevāti ettha pana atthato tāva ko saccaṭṭhoti ce?
anya-e0102n4:31_3: titthiyānaṁ attāva anupalabbhasabhāvo ca na hoti,
anya-e0102n4:31_4: atha kho bādhanappabhavasantiniyyānappakārena tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvena ariyañāṇassa gocaro hotiyeva.
anya-e0102n4:31_6: lokapakati viya ca tacchāviparītabhūtabhāvo saccaṭṭhoti veditabbo. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:32_0: Nābādhakaṁ yato dukkhaṁ, dukkhā aññaṁ na bādhakaṁ;
anya-e0102n4:34_0: Taṁ vinā nāññato dukkhaṁ, na hoti na ca taṁ tato;
anya-e0102n4:36_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, santaṁ na ca na taṁ yato;
anya-e0102n4:38_0: Maggā aññaṁ na niyyānaṁ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
anya-e0102n4:43_7: “Kasmā nu saccāni vadanti nānā pavādiyāse kusalāvadānā”tiādīsu diṭṭhisacce.
anya-e0102n4:43_8: “Ekaṁ hi saccaṁ na dutiya”ntiādīsu paramatthasacce nibbāne ceva magge ca.
anya-e0102n4:43_10: Svāyamidhāpi ariyasacce vattatīti evamettha atthuddhāratopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:44_0: 535.Anūnādhikatoti kasmā pana cattāreva ariyasaccāni vuttāni anūnāni anadhikānīti ce?
anya-e0102n4:44_2: Na hi etehi aññaṁ adhikaṁ vā,
anya-e0102n4:44_3: etesaṁ vā ekampi apanetabbaṁ sambhoti. Yathāha – “idha,
anya-e0102n4:44_5: āgaccheyya samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:44_7: Ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ ṭhapetvā aññaṁ dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n4:44_11: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā evaṁ vadeyya ‘netaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ yaṁ samaṇena gotamena desitaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:44_12: ahametaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paccakkhāya aññaṁ dukkhaṁ paṭhamaṁ ariyasaccaṁ paññapessāmī’ti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”tiādi.
anya-e0102n4:45_5: ālayaālayārāmatāālayasamugghātaālayasamugghātupāyānañca vasenāpi cattāreva vuttānīti evamettha anūnādhikato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:46_2: sabbasattasādhāraṇattā ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṁ paṭhamaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:46_6: Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṁ vā sattānaṁ saṁvegajananatthaṁ paṭhamaṁ dukkhamāha.
anya-e0102n4:46_9: ito pana hotīti ñāpanatthaṁ tadanantaraṁ samudayaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:46_10: Tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṁviggamānasānaṁ dukkhanissaraṇagavesīnaṁ nissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṁ nirodhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:46_11: Tato nirodhādhigamatthaṁ nirodhasampāpakaṁ magganti evamettha kamato vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:47_0: 537.Jātiādīnaṁ nicchayāti ye te ariyasaccāni niddisantena bhagavatā “jātipi dukkhā,
anya-e0102n4:47_7: saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti dukkhaniddese dvādasa dhammā,
anya-e0102n4:47_13: “yo tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti evaṁ nirodhaniddese atthato ekameva nibbānaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:47_18: sammāsamādhī”ti evaṁ magganiddese aṭṭha dhammāti iti catunnaṁ saccānaṁ niddese jātiādayo dhammā vuttā,
anya-e0102n4:47_19: tesaṁ jātiādīnaṁ nicchayāpi ettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:50_3: Tathā hesa “ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo”ti ettha bhave āgato. “Atthi, visākhe,
anya-e0102n4:51_1: Svāyamidha gabbhaseyyakānaṁ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchimhā nikkhamanaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:51_5: Nippariyāyato pana tattha tattha nibbattamānānaṁ sattānaṁ ye ye khandhā pātubhavanti,
anya-e0102n4:52_0: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā,
anya-e0102n4:54_0: Tattha kāyikacetasikā dukkhā vedanāsabhāvato ca nāmato ca dukkhattā dukkhadukkhanti vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:56_0: Upekkhā vedanā ceva avasesā ca tebhūmakā saṅkhārā udayabbayappaṭipīḷitattā saṅkhāradukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:56_1: Kaṇṇasūladantasūlarāgajapariḷāhadosajapariḷāhādi kāyikacetasiko ābādho pucchitvā jānitabbato upakkamassa ca apākaṭabhāvato paṭicchannadukkhaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n4:57_0: Dvattiṁsakammakāraṇādisamuṭṭhāno ābādho apucchitvāva jānitabbato upakkamassa ca pākaṭabhāvato appaṭicchannadukkhaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n4:58_0: Ṭhapetvā dukkhadukkhaṁ sesaṁ dukkhasaccavibhaṅge āgataṁ jātiādi sabbampi tassa tassa dukkhassa vatthubhāvato pariyāyadukkhaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:59_0: Tatrāyaṁ jāti yaṁ taṁ bālapaṇḍitasuttādīsu bhagavatāpi upamāvasena pakāsitaṁ āpāyikaṁ dukkhaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:59_1: yañca sugatiyampi manussaloke gabbhokkantimūlakādibhedaṁ dukkhaṁ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n4:60_2: ayaṁ hi satto mātukucchimhi nibbattamāno na uppalapadumapuṇḍarīkādīsu nibbattati,
anya-e0102n4:60_3: atha kho heṭṭhā āmāsayassa upari pakkāsayassa udarapaṭalapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṁ vemajjhe paramasambādhe tibbandhakārenānākuṇapagandhaparibhāvitaparamaduggandhapavanavicarite
anya-e0102n4:60_4: adhimattajegucche kucchipadese pūtimacchapūtikummāsacandanikādīsu kimi viya nibbattati.
anya-e0102n4:60_5: So tattha nibbatto dasa māse mātukucchisambhavena usmanā puṭapākaṁ viya paccamāno piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya sediyamāno
anya-e0102n4:61_0: Yaṁ pana so mātu sahasā upakkhalanagamananisīdanavuṭṭhānaparivattanādīsu surādhuttahatthagato eḷako viya
anya-e0102n4:61_1: ahituṇḍikahatthagato sappapotako viya ca ākaḍḍhanaparikaḍḍhanaodhūnananiddhūnanādinā upakkamena adhimattaṁ
anya-e0102n4:62_0: Yaṁ panassa mūḷhagabbhāya mātuyā mittāmaccasuhajjādīhipi adassanārahe dukkhuppattiṭṭhāne chedanaphālanādīhi dukkhaṁ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n4:63_0: Yaṁ vijāyamānāya mātuyā kammajehi vātehi parivattetvā narakapapātaṁ viya atibhayānakaṁ yonimaggaṁ paṭipātiyamānassa
anya-e0102n4:63_1: paramasambādhena yonimukhena tāḷacchiggaḷena viya nikkaḍḍhiyamānassa mahānāgassa narakasattassa viya
anya-e0102n4:65_0: Yaṁ tato paraṁ pavattiyaṁ attanāva attānaṁ vadhentassa acelakavatādivasena ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyuttassa,
anya-e0102n4:65_4: Yaṁ pana parato vadhabandhanādīni anubhavantassa uppajjati,
anya-e0102n4:66_0: Iti imassa sabbassāpi dukkhassa ayaṁ jāti vatthumeva hoti.
anya-e0102n4:74_0: Yaṁ taṁ kathaṁ tattha bhaveyya jātiṁ,
anya-e0102n4:82_0: Na taṁ bhave tattha na cassa jāti,
anya-e0102n4:87_0: Jātiṁ vinā itipi jāti ayañhi dukkhā.
anya-e0102n4:88_0: Kiṁ bhāsitena bahunā nanu yaṁ kuhiñci,
anya-e0102n4:99_0: “Pappoti dukkhaṁ yaṁ macco, kāyikaṁ mānasaṁ tathā;
anya-e0102n4:100_0: Sabbametaṁ jarāhetu, yasmā tasmā jarā dukhā”ti.
anya-e0102n4:103_1: yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “jarāmaraṇaṁ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita”nti.
anya-e0102n4:103_5: Jātipaccayā maraṇaṁ upakkamamaraṇaṁ sarasamaraṇaṁ āyukkhayamaraṇaṁ puññakkhayamaraṇantipi tasseva nāmaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:113_1: Sokādīsu soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo.
anya-e0102n4:117_0: Dukkhampi vividhaṁ yasmā, tasmā dukkhoti vuccatī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:129_0: Janayati yasmā tasmā, dukkhanti visesato vutta”nti.
anya-e0102n4:133_0: “Pīḷeti yato cittaṁ, kāyassa ca pīḷanaṁ samāvahati;
anya-e0102n4:137_5: Dukkho pana saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato cittaparidahanato kāyavisādanato ca.
anya-e0102n4:138_0: “Cittassa ca paridahanā, kāyassa visādanā ca adhimattaṁ;
anya-e0102n4:139_0: Yaṁ dukkhamupāyāso, janeti dukkho tato vutto”ti.
anya-e0102n4:141_0: Ettha ca mandagginā antobhājane pāko viya soko.
anya-e0102n4:141_1: Tikkhagginā paccamānassa bhājanato bahinikkhamanaṁ viya paridevo.
anya-e0102n4:141_2: Bahinikkhantāvasesassa nikkhamituṁ appahontassa antobhājaneyeva yāva parikkhayā pāko viya upāyāso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0102n4:157_0: 551.Yampicchaṁ na labhatīti ettha “aho vata mayaṁ na jātidhammā assāmā”tiādīsu alabbhaneyyavatthūsu icchāva yampicchaṁ na labhati,
anya-e0102n4:159_0: Yaṁ vighātamayaṁ dukkhaṁ, sattānaṁ idha jāyati.
anya-e0102n4:166_0: Avuttaṁ yañca taṁ sabbaṁ, vinā ete na vijjati.
anya-e0102n4:169_4: gāmaṁ viya gāmaghātakā upādānakkhandhapañcakameva jātiādayo nānappakārehi vibādhentā tiṇalatādīni viya bhūmiyaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:169_12: tena bādhiyamānānaṁ puthujjanānaṁ tattha paṭighuppattito cetobādhanadukkhaṁ domanassaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:169_14: manorathavighātappattānaṁ icchāvighātadukkhaṁ icchitālābhoti evaṁ nānappakārato upaparikkhiyamānā upādānakkhandhāva dukkhāti.
anya-e0102n4:169_15: Yadetaṁ ekamekaṁ dassetvā vuccamānaṁ anekehipi kappehi na sakkā asesato vattuṁ,
anya-e0102n4:169_16: tasmā taṁ sabbampi dukkhaṁ ekajalabindumhi sakalasamuddajalarasaṁ viya yesu kesuci pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu
anya-e0102n4:169_17: saṁkhipitvā dassetuṁ “saṁkhittena pañcupādānakkhandhā dukkhā”ti bhagavā avocāti.
anya-e0102n4:172_1: Samudayaniddese pana yāyaṁ taṇhāti yā ayaṁ taṇhā.
anya-e0102n4:172_5: nandīrāgena saddhiṁ atthato ekattameva gatāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n4:172_6: Tatra tatrābhinandinīti yatra yatra attabhāvo nibbattati,
anya-e0102n4:172_10: Kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā paṭiccasamuppādaniddese āvibhavissanti.
anya-e0102n4:172_11: Idha panāyaṁ tividhāpi dukkhasaccassa nibbattakaṭṭhena ekattaṁ upanetvā dukkhasamudayaṁ ariyasaccanti vuttāti veditabbā.
anya-e0102n4:175_1: Dukkhanirodhaniddese yo tassāyeva taṇhāyātiādinā nayena samudayanirodho vutto,
anya-e0102n4:180_1: tasmā bhagavā dukkhanirodhaṁ desento samudayanirodheneva desesi.
anya-e0102n4:180_3: Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā hetumhi paṭipajjanti, na phale.
anya-e0102n4:180_5: Te dukkhaṁ nirodhentā dukkhanirodhañca desentā attakilamathānuyogadesanādīhi phale paṭipajjanti,
anya-e0102n4:180_7: Evaṁ tāva dukkhanirodhassa samudayanirodhavasena desanāya payojanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:181_2: tassāyeva taṇhāyāti tassā “ponobbhavikā”ti vatvā kāmataṇhādivasena vibhattataṇhāya.
anya-e0102n4:181_8: tasmā aseso virāgo aseso nirodhoti evampettha yojanā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0102n4:181_9: Atthato pana sabbāneva etāni nibbānassa vevacanāni.
anya-e0102n4:181_10: Paramatthato hi dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti nibbānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:181_11: Yasmā pana taṁ āgamma taṇhā virajjati ceva nirujjhati ca,
anya-e0102n4:181_12: tasmā virāgoti ca nirodhoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0102n4:181_13: Yasmā ca tadeva āgamma tassā cāgādayo honti,
anya-e0102n4:185_1: Apica nibbānaṁ natthīti na vattabbaṁ, kasmā?
anya-e0102n4:185_3: Asati hi nibbāne sammādiṭṭhipurejavāya sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgahāya sammāpaṭipattiyā vañjhabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0102n4:185_13: Tadā kilesānaṁ avattamānattā na dosoti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n4:185_15: Evañhi sati ariyamaggakkhaṇato pubbepi kilesā na santīti ariyamaggassa niratthakabhāvo āpajjati.
anya-e0102n4:186_12: Yasmā khayā paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo pavatti nāma hoti,
anya-e0102n4:186_13: tassa nibbānabhāvato na dosoti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n4:186_19: Tato ca paṭṭhāya na bhiyyo dosānaṁ pavattīti.
anya-e0102n4:188_3: Maggabhāve bhāvato na appabhavanti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n4:189_2: Nibbānassa niccattā te niccāti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n4:189_4: Niccā uppādādīnaṁ abhāvato nibbānaṁ viyāti ce. Na,
anya-e0102n4:190_6: upādisesañca upādāya paññāpanīyattā saha upādisesena paññāpiyatīti saupādisesaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:190_7: Yo cassa samudayappahānena upahatāyatikammaphalassa carimacittato ca uddhaṁ pavattikhandhānaṁ anuppādanato,
anya-e0102n4:190_9: taṁ upādāya paññāpanīyato natthi ettha upādisesoti anupādisesaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:191_1: sabbaññuvacanato ca paramatthena sabhāvato nibbānaṁ nāvijjamānaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:194_1: Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāniddese vuttā pana aṭṭha dhammā kāmaṁ khandhaniddesepi atthato pakāsitāyeva,
anya-e0102n4:194_2: idha pana nesaṁ ekakkhaṇe pavattamānānaṁ visesāvabodhanatthaṁ vadāma.
anya-e0102n4:194_3: Saṅkhepato hi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yogino nibbānārammaṇaṁ avijjānusayasamugghātakaṁ paññācakkhu sammādiṭṭhi.
anya-e0102n4:194_7: Tathā sampannadiṭṭhino taṁsampayuttaṁ micchāsaṅkappanighātakaṁ cetaso nibbānapadābhiniropanaṁ sammāsaṅkappo.
anya-e0102n4:195_0: Tathā passato vitakkayato ca taṁsampayuttāva vacīduccaritasamugghātikā micchāvācāya virati sammāvācā nāma.
anya-e0102n4:195_4: Tathā viramato taṁsampayuttāva micchākammantasamucchedikā pāṇātipātādivirati sammākammanto nāma.
anya-e0102n4:195_8: Yā panassa tesaṁ sammāvācākammantānaṁ visuddhibhūtā taṁsampayuttāva kuhanādiupacchedikā micchājīvavirati,
anya-e0102n4:196_0: Athassa yo tassā sammāvācākammantājīvasaṅkhātāya sīlabhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhitassa tadanurūpo taṁsampayuttova kosajjasamucchedako vīriyārambho,
anya-e0102n4:196_5: Tassevaṁ vāyamato taṁsampayuttova micchāsativiniddhunano cetaso asammoso sammāsati nāma.
anya-e0102n4:196_9: Evaṁ anuttarāya satiyā saṁrakkhiyamānacittassa taṁsampayuttāva micchāsamādhividdhaṁsikā cittekaggatā sammāsamādhi nāma.
anya-e0102n4:197_3: Tattha anubodhañāṇaṁ lokiyaṁ anussavādivasena nirodhe magge ca pavattati.
anya-e0102n4:197_4: Paṭivedhañāṇaṁ lokuttaraṁ nirodhamārammaṇaṁ katvā kiccato cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yathāha – “yo,
anya-e0102n4:198_1: tattha dukkhañāṇaṁ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavavasena pavattamānaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0102n4:198_5: Dukkhañāṇaṁ vā dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvavirahitesu khandhesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvasaññāsaṅkhātaṁ phale vippaṭipattiṁ.
anya-e0102n4:198_6: Samudayañāṇaṁ issarapadhānakālasabhāvādīhi loko pavattatīti akāraṇe kāraṇābhimānappavattaṁ hetumhi vippaṭipattiṁ.
anya-e0102n4:198_8: Maggañāṇaṁ kāmasukhallikaattakilamathānuyogappabhede avisuddhimagge visuddhimaggagāhavasena pavattaṁ upāye vippaṭipattiṁ nivatteti.
anya-e0102n4:200_0: Sammuyhati tāva naro, na vijānāti yāva saccānī”ti.
anya-e0102n4:202_0: 564.Antogadhānaṁ pabhedāti dukkhasaccasmiṁ hi ṭhapetvā taṇhañceva anāsavadhamme ca sesā sabbadhammā antogadhā.
anya-e0102n4:202_8: Sabbesaṁyeva vā etesaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṁ ariyakantasīlattā ariyakantasīlassa ca saddhāhatthena
anya-e0102n4:202_13: antogadhānīti evamettha antogadhānaṁ pabhedatopi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:203_23: taṁsampāpakavāyāmehi ca yojetvāpetāni upamāto veditabbānīti evamettha upamāto vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:204_5: Tattha maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca “yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti vacanato saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:204_9: Itaraṁ pana ariyasaccadvayaṁ siyā dukkhaṁ aniccato,
anya-e0102n4:204_10: na pana yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathattena.
anya-e0102n4:204_11: Sabbākārena pana upādānakkhandhapañcakaṁ dukkhañceva ariyasaccañca aññatra taṇhāya.
anya-e0102n4:204_12: Maggasampayuttā dhammā sāmaññaphalāni ca yassa pariññatthaṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati tathattena neva dukkhaṁ na ariyasaccaṁ.
anya-e0102n4:204_13: Evaṁ samudayādīsupi yathāyogaṁ yojetvā catukkatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:205_1: Suññatekavidhādīhītiettha suññato tāva paramatthena hi sabbāneva saccāni vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n4:213_2: Phalasuñño vā ettha hetu samudaye dukkhassābhāvato,
anya-e0102n4:213_4: na phalena sagabbho pakativādīnaṁ pakati viya.
anya-e0102n4:213_6: na hetusamavetaṁ hetuphalaṁ samavāyavādīnaṁ dviaṇukādi viya.
anya-e0102n4:215_0: Suñño phalena hetu, phalampi taṁhetunā suñña”nti.
anya-e0102n4:221_4: Ayañhi sappadesattā nagaraṁ viya rajjena nippadesehi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:222_2: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā,
anya-e0102n4:223_2: Kiñcāpi hi pāḷiyaṁ sīlakkhandheti bhummena niddeso kato,
anya-e0102n4:223_4: Sammāvāyāmādīsu pana tīsu samādhi attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0102n4:223_5: vīriye pana paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro hutvā sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:224_1: yathā hi nakkhattaṁ kīḷissāmāti uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhesu tīsu sahāyesu eko supupphitaṁ campakarukkhaṁ disvā hatthaṁ ukkhipitvā gahetumpi na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n4:224_3: so tassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvāpi kampamāno gahetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya.
anya-e0102n4:224_5: So ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha yathāruci pupphāni ocinitvā piḷandhitvā nakkhattaṁ kīḷeyya.
anya-e0102n4:225_0: Ekato uyyānaṁ paviṭṭhā tayo sahāyā viya hi ekato jātā sammāvāyāmādayo tayo dhammā.
anya-e0102n4:225_2: Hatthaṁ ukkhipitvāpi gahetuṁ asakkonto viya attano dhammatāya ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ asakkonto samādhi.
anya-e0102n4:225_5: Yathā tesu ekassa piṭṭhiyaṁ ṭhatvā ekassa aṁsakūṭaṁ olubbha itaro yathāruci pupphaṁ gahetuṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n4:225_6: evameva vīriye paggahakiccaṁ sādhente satiyā ca apilāpanakiccaṁ sādhentiyā laddhupakāro samādhi sakkoti ārammaṇe ekaggabhāvena appetuṁ.
anya-e0102n4:226_0: Sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappesupi paññā attano dhammatāya aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ārammaṇaṁ nicchetuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_1: Vitakke pana ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā dente sakkoti. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0102n4:226_2: Yathā hi heraññiko kahāpaṇaṁ hatthe ṭhapetvā sabbabhāgesu oloketukāmo samānopi na cakkhutaleneva parivattetuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_3: Aṅgulipabbehi pana parivattetvā parivattetvā ito cito ca oloketuṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n4:226_4: evameva na paññā attano dhammatāya aniccādivasena ārammaṇaṁ nicchetuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_5: Abhiniropanalakkhaṇena pana āhananapariyāhananarasena vitakkena ākoṭentena viya parivattentena viya ca ādāyādāya dinnameva nicchetuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0102n4:226_6: Tasmā idhāpi sammādiṭṭhiyeva sajātito paññākkhandhena saṅgahitā,
anya-e0102n4:227_0: Iti imehi tīhi khandhehi maggo saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n4:228_7: Catubbidhāni pariññeyyādibhedatoti evamettha ekavidhādīhi vinicchayo veditabbo.
anya-e0102n4:229_0: 569.Sabhāgavisabhāgatoti sabbāneva saccāni aññamaññaṁ sabhāgāni avitathato attasuññato dukkarapaṭivedhato ca. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n4:230_1: katamaṁ nu kho dukkarataraṁ vā durabhisambhavataraṁ vā,
anya-e0102n4:230_2: yo vā dūratova sukhumena tāḷacchiggaḷena asanaṁ atipāteyya poṅkhānupoṅkhaṁ avirādhitaṁ,
anya-e0102n4:230_3: yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti? Etadeva, bhante,
anya-e0102n4:230_5: yo vā satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭiṁ paṭivijjheyyāti.
anya-e0102n4:231_1: Purimāni ca dve sabhāgāni duravagāhatthena gambhīrattā lokiyattā sāsavattā ca.
anya-e0102n4:231_3: Pacchimānipi dve sabhāgāni gambhīrattena duravagāhattā lokuttarattā anāsavattā ca.
anya-e0102n4:232_0: Iti evaṁ pakārehi, nayehi ca vicakkhaṇo;
